job description:
U.S. Citizens and those authorized to work in the U.S. are encouraged to apply. We are unable to sponsor at this time.

Applicants only, no corp-to-corp candidates, third parties, or agencies please.

Required Skills and Experience:
  • Data analysis experience
  • Data profiling, mapping, cleansing, and quality experience
  • Strong SQL experience
  • Experience identifying data anomalies
  • Experience eliciting, analyzing, validating, and documenting IT systems and applications project requirements.
  • Experience eliciting, analyzing, and documenting functional and non-functional requirements
  • Experience building data sets
  • Experience identifying gaps in reports
  • Accountability for requirements deliverables and artifacts
  • Breaking down or decomposing Epics
  • Developing story cards
Desired Skills and Experience:
  • ETL concepts
  • Data Warehouse concepts
Job Description:

We are seeking a Data Analyst to join our team and work at our client location in a long-term, right-to-hire position. You will work in an exciting, collaborative, and diverse environment in which you’ll be a key member of the team, exercising your functional, interpersonal, communication, and technical skills while having full accountability for requirements deliverables and artifacts. Specifically, you will:
  • Elicit, analyze, validate, and document system and application requirements
  • Develop functional and non-functional requirements
  • Perform data profiling and identify data anomalies
  • Perform data analysis (profiling, mapping, and cleansing of data)
  • Identify gaps in reports
  • Develop SQL queries
  • Break down Epics
  • Develop story cards
  • Use Agile practices
